reverse: Reverse string data from process.stdin to process.stdout.
transform: Convert data from process.stdin to upper-case data on process.stdout.
convertFromFile: Convert file provided by --file option from csv to json and output data to process.stdout.
--file option is required for this command. You need to provide a correct 'csv' file.
convertToFile: Convert file provided by --file option from csv to json and output data
to a result file with the same name but json extension.
--file option is required for this command. You need to provide a correct 'csv' file.
outputFile: Pipe the given file provided by --file option to process.stdout.
--file option is required for this command. You need to provide an existing file.
cssBundle: --path option is required for this command. You need to provide an existing path.
a.Grab all css files from the given path provided by --path option.
b.Concat them into one (big) css file.
c.Add contents of https://epa.ms/nodejs18-hw3-css to the end of the result file.
d.Save the output in the file called bundle.css placed in the same provided path.
